app.title: A11y Showcase
app.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for building accessible web applications

hero.title: Accessibility Champions
hero.description: A comprehensive toolkit for building accessible web applications. Test WCAG compliance, explore modern React patterns, and empower your team with accessibility best practices.

features.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
features.description: Built by accessibility experts, for accessibility champions. Everything you need to create inclusive digital experiences.

wcag.title: WCAG 2.2 Compliance
wcag.description: Comprehensive accessibility testing with pa11y to ensure your sites meet the highest standards.

realtime.title: Real-time Testing
realtime.description: Instant feedback on accessibility issues with detailed explanations and remediation guidance.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Built for Accessibility Champions Programs to train and empower teams across organizations.

expertise.title: Expert Guidance
expertise.description: Created by an A11y SME with VPAT experience to provide industry best practices.

technology.title: Modern Technology Stack
technology.description: Built with the latest tools and frameworks for optimal performance and developer experience.

testing.title: Accessibility Testing
testing.description: Test any website for WCAG 2.2 compliance using our integrated pa11y testing tool. Get detailed reports with actionable insights to improve accessibility.

showcase.title: Component Showcase
showcase.description: Explore how ShadCN UI components integrate with TanStack libraries to create accessible, performant user interfaces.

buttons.title: Button Variants
buttons.description: Accessible button components with proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation.
